short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows you news articles with different points of view on a topic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that gives you links to other news sources about the same topic you are reading about on your currently open page. Further you can save those topics and find them on our web site: http://knowthenews.surge.sh/
